alert.note: Alert for Bartholomew (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 9:49AM EST until March 07 at 6:33PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis IN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana... Haw Creek near Clifford. .Rainfall amounts of around two to two and a half inches in the Haw Creek basin is producing minor flooding in that area. The creek should crest just before afternoon and come back below flood by late afternoon. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Haw Creek near Clifford. * WHEN...From this morning to this evening. * IMPACTS...At 12.5 feet, Rocky Ford Road just west of Marr Road closes because of flooding. Rocky Ford Road floods on the westside of the bridge. Columbus People Trail also flooded. CR 450 N outside of the City of Columbus is closed according to Columbus Flood Response Plan. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM EST Monday the stage was 13.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 AM EST Monday was 13.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 8.3 feet this evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement for this location should be issued this afternoon.
